name: Rock Climbing Kitty Demo
description:
You play as a dragon-cat trying to climb your way out of a cave. 

This is a demo of the first area in the game.  Hopefully I can get more of the game done later, but right now I just have the first area.

You can only jump and climb to move.

Controls:

Space to jump

Space + d to jump forward 

Space + a  to jump  backward

w to climb walls

Left shift to hold onto walls

Escape to quit the game

f to attack

hold x for magic attack
